events.message: I received my order last week but the item isn't what I expected. I want to request a refund because the product does not meet the description and I am quite disappointed.
The customer reported dissatisfaction with the product and requested a refund. The case is categorized under Refund.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and follow up with the customer promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm sorry to hear the product didn't meet your expectations. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund request so I can check the details and assist you further?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product was supposed to be a wireless mouse but I received a wired one instead, so I want to return it and get my money back.

Thank you for the information. We will arrange a return shipping label for you and process a full refund once we receive the item back. Please print the label and send the product back at your earliest convenience.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will print the label and send the item back tomorrow as suggested.
We have received your returned item and processed the refund. The amount should reflect in your payment account in 3-5 business days. Thank you for your patience.
We just wanted to check in to ensure that your refund was received and if you have any more questions or need further assistance, please let us know.
As there is no further response from the customer and the refund was completed successfully, the case has now been closed. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent a customer satisfaction survey to gather your feedback about your recent support experience. We appreciate your input.
